title: Himachal: Hotel association announces 50 per cent discount, minister says state safe to travel
description: The state government had safely evacuated about 75,000 tourists from different parts of the state recently. Videos of landslides blocking roads, tourists stranded, floods damaging buildings, sweeping vehicles and roads caving in causing enormous damage to life and property had gone viral since July 9 and as a result the tourists are apprehensive to travel to the hill state during the ongoing monsoon.
